RelatedSentence: Electroworld operates 26 specialist electrical retail stores across Czech Republic and Slovakia .

Sebastian James , Dixons Retail Group Chief Executive , said : ' I am very pleased that we have been able to secure a strong future for Electroworld who will be able to flourish as a part of the NAY Group in Central Europe .
